metadata.title: CVE-2018-11697 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in LibSass through 3.5.4. An out-of-bounds read of a memory region was found in the function Sass::Prelexer::exactly() which could be leveraged by an attacker to disclose information or manipulated to read from unmapped memory causing a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libsass package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
